⁠
Software Engineer - Python - Platform - Data
Who they are
A global fintech powerhouse is looking for a
Software Engineer
to help design, build and scale data platforms that sit at the heart of their world-class trading and research operations. This is a high-impact engineering role, ideal for someone who blends strong software fundamentals with a passion for data systems, performance optimisation, and infrastructure reliability.
The role
You'll join a research-aligned engineering team, focused on building high-performance systems that process large volumes of market data. You'll collaborate with global teams to evolve data infrastructure, improve tooling, and ensure researchers and traders have access to fast, reliable, and cost-efficient data pipelines.
Key responsibilities:
Platform and Tooling development
Design and build scalable data pipelines using Python & Spark
Develop and maintain software components that support research workflows
Implement observability, monitoring, and tuning for system performance and throughput
Optimise resource usage and infrastructure costs (especially in cloud environments like AWS)
Contribute to tooling, automation, and internal platform improvements
Document best practices and guide engineering decisions with a long-term mindset
Mentor junior engineers and contribute to the growth of the Sydney team
What you'll bring
Extensive software engineering experience with a focus on back-end platforms with Python Data Systems
Strong programming skills in
Python
(bonus if you've used C++, Rust)
Familiarity with modern tools such as PostgreSQL, AWS, Kafka, Spark
Proven experience working on high availabilty / global distributed systems
Strong problem-solving skills - you enjoy diving deep into performance, reliability, and scale
Why join?
Work on software that directly enables research and trading decisions
Tackle complex engineering problems alongside world-class peers
Blended software development, Platform & data engineering thinking in one role
Competitive salary + industry leading bonuses
Daily breakfast, lunch and in-house barista
Annual company trips + regular team events
Visa sponsorship and relocation support if required
If you're a software engineer who thrives on solving platform & data challenges at scale, this is your chance to make an impact in one of the most advanced trading environments in the world.
Don’t provide your bank or credit card details when applying for jobs.
